ExtendedSection.Title: Arguments for calling the shell via RMI

Text.name: Text0
Text.content: The port to connect via RMI. This must be provided. The value is the port specified in the opencms-system.xml. E.g., for the configuration as examplified above, you must add -registryPort=1101.

Text.name: Text0
Text.content: Takes an OpenCms shell script to execute. If provided the shell will run in batch mode. E.g., you could add the option -script=myscript.ocsh.

Text.name: Text0
Text.content:
Provide an additional class with shell commands, e.g., when having OCEE cluster installed, you could put the option
-additional=org.opencms.ocee.cluster.CmsClusterShellCommands.
